overview: This beautifully moving short story shares an insight into Janeâ€™s commitment, compassion and love for rescuing animals that most of our society considers food.  Showing them the same respect as our companion animals, Jane has created a forever home for over 130 farm animals.  An award-winning, debut short film from filmmaker Damian Sciberras, featuring Jane Baker, founder of Starfield Farm Animal Sanctuary.
title: Saved By Jane
